subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Boo Weekley and Heath Slocum of the United States shot a three-under-par 69 yesterday to maintain a one-stroke lead after two rounds of the World Cup of Golf in Shenzhen, China. England’s Justin Rose and Ian Poulter and Scotland’s Colin Montgomerie and Marc Warren shot 68s and trail by a shot at 13-under 131.South Africa’s Trevor Immelman and Retief Goosen were another shot back after a 69. Denmark (68), Italy (68) and Germany (71) were three back.
